AI Agents: Opportunities, Risks, and Mitigations

This document discusses the opportunities, risks, and mitigations of AI agents, highlighting the benefits and challenges of using these agents in various fields. The authors acknowledge the contributions of multiple experts and express gratitude to the AI Ethics Board workstream's co-chairs and executive sponsors.

Key Concepts:

  • Artificial Intelligence
  • Moral Responsibility
  • Bias in AI Systems
  • Amplified Reason
  • Trust Mismatch
  • Function-calling hallucination
AI Ethics Agents attackers system degradation personalization identity impersonation feedback manipulation
